# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which we believe is worth more than $100 to you. Considering its exceptional quality and value, I am extending this exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you can purchase the product for $95. This is an opportunity to save $5 compared to the regular price. Don't miss out on this chance to own something truly special. If you're interested, please let me know and I'll proceed with the transaction immediately. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $95. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $95
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
